name: Class Format
desc: The classroom format for an academic program offered

name: Degree Type
desc: The type of degree being offered for the academic program

name: Field of Study
desc: The generic field of study that is helpful in marketing an academic program offered - NOT the internal organizational department

desc: The academic program type of the academic program offered

name: University Department
desc: Can be faculty, but not related to "schools-of"
